headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Add New Vehicles to your Races
content: When new vehicles are added to GTA Online, they won’t automatically be available in Races you created previously.~n~~n~However you can quickly edit and republish any Race to include newer vehicles. This can be done via the Available Vehicles Menu in the Creator - simply enter the Menu and use the ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ button to modify a selected class’s allowed vehicles. You can then specify which vehicles are included and add anything new that has been released.
